record.description: University of Chicago trains men for military service. Four weekends on the University of Chicago's Mill Road Farm at Lake Forest, formerly the Lasker estate, are being devoted to a pre-service basic military course by men between 18 and 45. The students are learning the proper kneeling position for rifle fire and how to perform setting-up exercises. The course covers Army organization, military law, map work, marksmanship, infantry drill, gas protection, elementary tactics, and combat games.
